description.value:
the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw. Creatures inside the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can be seen but have total cover.

A creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take an action to pull a creature or object out of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Doing so requires a successful DC 12 Strength check, and the creature making the attempt takes 10 (3d6) acid damage. the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can hold only one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures inside it at a time.

the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw. Creatures inside the cube can be seen but have total cover. A creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take an action to pull a creature or object out of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Doing so requires a successful Strength check.
